com.qualcomm.hardware.adafruit

Class AdafruitI2cColorSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.I2cControllerPortDeviceImpl
      • com.qualcomm.hardware.adafruit.AdafruitI2cColorSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ColorSensor, HardwareDevice, I2cController.I2cPortReadyCallback, I2cControllerPortDevice, RobotArmingStateNotifier.Callback
    Deprecated. 
    This should be retired in favor of AMSColorSensorImpl

    @Deprecated
public class AdafruitI2cColorSensor
extends I2cControllerPortDeviceImpl
implements ColorSensor, I2cController.I2cPortReadyCallback

      • argb

        public int argb()
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: ColorSensor
        Gets a integer whose bits specify all four channels' current intensities
        Specified by:
        argb in interface ColorSensor
        Returns:
        an sRGB color with the specified combined RGBA value consisting of the white component in bits 24-31, the red component in bits 16-23, the green component in bits 8-15, and the blue component in bits 0-7

      • setI2cAddress

        public void setI2cAddress(I2cAddr newAddress)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: ColorSensor
        Changes the I2C address that the sensor responds on. This only works for the Modern Robotics sensor. The sensor will keep its new address (even on loss of power) until it is set to a different value.
        Specified by:
        setI2cAddress in interface ColorSensor
        Parameters:
        newAddress - the new address; the 8-bit value must be a multiple of 2 between 16 and 126, inclusive
        See Also:
        ModernRoboticsI2cColorSensor

      • getI2cAddress

        public I2cAddr getI2cAddress()
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: ColorSensor
        Get the current I2C Address of this object. Not necessarily the same as the I2C address of the actual device. Return the current I2C address.
        Specified by:
        getI2cAddress in interface ColorSensor
        Returns:
        current I2C address
